body_content.explanation: a way of referring to a baby or small child:
examples: Until the bump shows and we feel the bub move, the pregnancy doesn't seem real.
I have to put the cookies high up so that bubs doesn't get to them!

body_content.explanation: a form of address used to another person, especially a man, sometimes in a slightly angry way:
examples: That may be what you do at home, but listen, bub, you don't do it here!
Sorry bubs, you don't fool me, you'll have to come up with another way to rip off your clients!
